author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Recently, in #28763 a set of classes for simulation of SIMP exotic particles was forward-ported from 7_1. These classes are incompatible with new Geant4 10.6, because original authors overwrite too many virtual methods of classes. Only public methods of Geant4 classes are stable between versions 10.0 and 10.6, private and protected method signatures potentially may be changed. 

This PR includes general clean-up, which means removal all unnecessary things. 

#### PR validation:
title: Clean-up SIMP particles simulation
